title: Ex's Revenge
overview: The avenging bride and the fake groom arrange a wedding. Designer An Dudu finds out that her fiance Qin Lan is cheating on her while they are preparing for the wedding, and finds him in bed with his mistress Li Weiwei. Unexpectedly, Qin Lan did not cancel the wedding, but replaced his future wife with Li Weiwei. Dudu hired a man as a groom to make a scene at the wedding of Qin Lan and Li Weiwei, and this man turned out to be Qin Qi, the head of the Qin family... Qin Qi helped An Dood, but that was just the beginning of the problems. The war is about to begin...
